code: import React from'react';import{RatingView}from'react-simple-star-rating';import'./Review.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Review=function Review(_ref){var product=_ref.product;var username=product.username,comment=product.comment,imageURL=product.imageURL,ratingPoint=product.ratingPoint;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-light",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"review-img",src:imageURL,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"fw-bold",children:username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"w-75 mx-auto",children:comment}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RatingView,{ratingValue:ratingPoint/* RatingView Props */})]});};export default Review;
